name: For the curious, Indiepaper is built on top of @awscloud Lambda and is open source. Check it out at https://www.indiepaper.io.

content.html: For the curious, Indiepaper is built on top of @awscloud Lambda and is open source. Check it out at https://www.indiepaper.io.

summary: @cleverdevil I just discovered this today. It’s super interesting. I had no idea about this whole sub culture of an ‘indie web’. I’ve set this up with micro.blog. I’ve no idea how to see the articles I save there yet, but thanks for making it. Looking forward to digging in a little deeper.

summary: @AndyNicolaides awesome! Welcome to the IndieWeb. There is a great community that you can engage with at chat.indieweb.org (either in IRC or Slack). We're a helpful bunch!
